GV05prasupbu:1: oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadraṃ paśyemākṣibhiryajatrāḥ /
GV05prasupbu:4: svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ /
GV05prasupbu:5: svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatirdadhātu //
GV05prasupbu:11: na sā yena kenaciditi vidyāṃ stauti /
GV05prasupbu:16_0: sukeśā ca bhāradvājaḥ śaibyaś ca satyakāmaḥ sauryāyaṇī ca gārgyaḥ kausalyaś cāśvalāyano
GV05prasupbu:16_1: bhārgavo vaidarbhiḥ kabandhī kātyāyanas te haite brahmaparā brahmaniṣṭhā paraṃ brahmānveṣamāṇā
GV05prasupbu:16_2: eṣa ha vai tatsarvaṃ vakṣyatīti te ha samitpāṇayo bhagavantaṃ pippalādam upasannāḥ || PrUp_1.1 ||
GV05prasupbu:21: śaibyaśca śiveḥ apatyaṃ śaibyaḥ satyakāmo nāmataḥ;
GV05prasupbu:22: sauryāyaṇī sūryastasyāpatyaṃ sauryaḥ tasyāpatyaṃ sauryāyaṇiśachāndasaḥ sauryāyaṇīti,
GV05prasupbu:23: gārgyo gargagotrāpatyaṃ bhargavo vaidarbhiḥ vidarbhe bhavaḥ;kabandhī nāmataḥ,
GV05prasupbu:26: te haite brahmaparā aparaṃ brahma paratvena gatāstadanuṣṭhānaniṣṭhāśca brahmaniṣṭhāḥ paraṃ brahmānveṣamāṇāḥ - kiṃ tat?
GV05prasupbu:27: yannityaṃ vijñeyamiti tatprāptyarthaṃ yathākāmaṃ yatiṣyāma ityevaṃ tadanveṣaṇaṃ kurvantastadadhigamāyaiṣa ha vai tatsarvaṃ vakṣyatītyācāryamupajagmuḥ /
GV05prasupbu:28: katham te ha samitpāṇayaḥ samidlāragṛhītahastāḥ santo bhagavantaṃ pippalādamācāryamupāsannā upajagmuḥ //
GV05prasupbu:32: bhūya eva tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śraddhayā saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsyatha |
GV05prasupbu:34: yadi vijñāsyāmaḥ sarvaṃ ha vo vakṣyāma iti || PrUp_1.2 ||
GV05prasupbu:37_0: tānevamupagatānha sa kila ṛṣiruvāca bhūyaḥ punareva yadyapi yūyaṃ pūrvaṃ tapasmina
GV05prasupbu:37_1: eva tapasendriyasaṃyamena tathāpīha viśeṣato brahmacaryeṇa śraddhayā cāstikyabuddhyādaravantaḥ
GV05prasupbu:37_2: saṃvatsaraṃ kālaṃ saṃvatsyatha samyagguruśuśrūṣāparāḥ santo vatsyatha /
GV05prasupbu:38: tato yathākāmaṃ yo yasya kāmastamanatikramya yathākāmaṃ yadviṣaye yasya jijñāsā tadviṣayānpraśnānpṛcchata /
GV05prasupbu:39: yadi tadyuṣmatpṛṣṭama vijñāsyāmaḥ - anuddhatatvapradarśanārtho yadiśabdo nājñānasaṃśayārthaḥ praśnanirṇayādavasīyate - sarvaṃ ha vo vaḥ pṛṣṭaṃ vakṣyāma iti //2//
GV05prasupbu:43: bhagavan kuto ha vā imāḥ prajāḥ prajāyanta iti || PrUp_1.3 ||
GV05prasupbu:46: atha saṃvatsarādūdhvaṃ kabandhī kātyāyana upetyopagamya papraccha pṛṣṭavān /
GV05prasupbu:47: he bhagavan kutaḥ kasmāddha vā imā brāhmaṇādyāḥ prajāḥ prajāyanta utpadyante /
GV05prasupbu:48: aparavidyākarmaṇoḥ samuccitayoryatkāryaṃ yā gatistadvaktavyamiti tadartho 'yaṃ praśnaḥ //3//
GV05prasupbu:54: sa tapas taptvā sa mithunam utpādayate rayiṃ ca prāṇaṃ ceti |
GV05prasupbu:55: etau me bahudhāḥ prajāḥ kariṣyata iti || PrUp_1.4 ||
GV05prasupbu:58: tasmā evaṃ pṛṣṭavate sa hovāca tadapākaraṇāyāha /
GV05prasupbu:59_0: prajākāmaḥ prajā ātmanaḥ sisṛkṣurvai prajāpatiḥ sarvātmā sajjagatsrakṣyāmi ityevaṃ
GV05prasupbu:59_1: vijñānavānyathoktakārī tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ kalpādau nivṛtto hiraṇyagarbhaḥ sṛjyamānānāṃ
GV05prasupbu:59_2: prajānāṃ sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ patiḥ sajjanmāntarabhāvitaṃ jñānaṃ śrutiprakāśitārthaviṣayaṃ
GV05prasupbu:60: ata tu sa evaṃ tapastaptvā śrautaṃ jñānamanvālocya sṛṣṭisādhanabhūtaṃ mithunamutpādayate mithunaṃ dvandvamutpāditavān /
GV05prasupbu:61: rayiṃ ca somamannaṃ praṇaṃ cāgnimattāram etāvagniṣomāvattrannabhūtau me mama bahudhānekadhā prajāḥ kariṣyata ityevaṃ saṃcintyāṇḍotpattikrameṇa sūryācandramasāvakalpayat //4//
GV05prasupbu:64: ādityo ha vai prāṇo rayir eva candramāḥ |
GV05prasupbu:65: rayir vā etat sarvaṃ yanmūrtaṃ cāmūrtaṃ ca |
GV05prasupbu:70: rayireva candramāḥ, rayiḥ, evānnaṃ soma eva /
GV05prasupbu:71: tadetadekamattā cānnaṃ ca, prajāpatirekaṃ tu mithunam, guṇapradhānakṛto bhedaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:74: kiṃ tadyanmūrtaṃ ta sthūlaṃ cāmūrtaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ ca mūrtāmūrte attrannarūpe rayireva /
GV05prasupbu:80: athāditya udayan yatprācīṃ diśaṃ praviśati tena prācyān prāṇān raśmiṣu saṃnidhatte |
GV05prasupbu:81: yad dakṣiṇaṃ yat pratīcīṃ yad udīcīṃ yad adho yad ūrdhvaṃ yad antarā diśo yat sarvaṃ prakāśayati tena sarvān prāṇān raśmiṣu saṃnidhatte || PrUp_1.6 ||
GV05prasupbu:84: athāditya udayannudgacchan prāṇināṃ cakṣurgocaramāgacchan yatprācīṃ diśaṃ svaprakāśena praviśati vyāpnoti;
GV05prasupbu:85: tena svātmāvabhāsarūpeṣu vyāptimatsu vyāptatvātprāṇinaḥ saṃnidhatte saṃniveśayati;
GV05prasupbu:87_0: tathaiva yatpraviśati dakṣiṇāṃ yatpratīcīṃ yadudīcīmadha ūrdhvaṃ yatpraviśati yaccāntarā
GV05prasupbu:87_1: diśaḥ koṇadiśo 'vāntaradiśo yaccānyat sarvaṃ prakāśayati tena svaprakāśavyāptyā sarvān
GV05prasupbu:94: sa eṣo 'ttā praṇo vaiśvānaraḥ sarvātmā viśvarūpo viśvātmatvācca prāṇo 'gniśca sa evāttodayata udgacchati pratyahaṃ sarvā diśa ātmasātkurvan /
GV05prasupbu:98: viśvarūpaṃ hariṇaṃ jātavedasaṃ parāyaṇaṃ jyotir ekaṃ tapantam /
GV05prasupbu:99: sahasraraśmiḥ śatadhā vartamānaḥ prāṇaḥ prajānām udayaty eṣa sūryaḥ // PrUp_1.8 //
GV05prasupbu:102_0: viśvarūpaṃ sarvarūpaṃ hariṇaṃ raśmivantaṃ jātavedasaṃ jātaprajñānaṃ parāyaṇaṃ sarvaprāṇāśayaṃ
GV05prasupbu:102_1: jyotirekaṃ sarvaprāṇināṃ cakṣurbhūtamadvitīyaṃ tapantaṃ tāpakriyāṃ kurvāṇaṃ svātmānaṃ
GV05prasupbu:104: sahasraraśmiranekaraśmiḥ śatadhānekadhā prāṇibhedena vartamānaḥ prāṇaḥ prajānāmudayatyeṣa sūryaḥ //8//
GV05prasupbu:105: yaścāsau candramā mūrtirannam amūrtiśca prāṇo 'ttādityastadekam etanmithunaṃ sarvaṃ kathaṃ prajāḥ kariṣyata iti ucyate-
GV05prasupbu:110: tad ye ha vai tadiṣṭāpūrte kṛtim ity upāsate te cāndramasam eva lokam abhijayante |
GV05prasupbu:112: tasmād eta ṛṣayaḥ prajākāmā dakṣiṇaṃ pratipadyante |
GV05prasupbu:113: eṣa ha vai rayir yaḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ || PrUp_1.9 ||
GV05prasupbu:120_0: tasya saṃvatsarasya prajāpaterayane mārgau dvau dakṣiṇaṃ cottaraṃ ca dve prasiddhe
GV05prasupbu:120_1: hyayane ṣaṇmāsalakṣaṇe yābhyāṃ dakṣiṇenottareṇa ca yāti savitā kevalakarmiṇāṃ jñānasaṃyuktakarmavatāṃ ca lokān vidadhat /
GV05prasupbu:122: tat tatra ca brāhmaṇādiṣu ye ha vai tadupāsata iti,
GV05prasupbu:124: iṣṭaṃ ca pūrtaṃ ceṣṭāpūrte ityādi kṛtamevopāsate nākṛtaṃ nityaṃ te cāndramasaṃ candramasi bhavaṃ prajāndramasya /
GV05prasupbu:125: te tatraiva ca kṛtakṣayātpunarāvartante“imaṃ lokaṃ hīnataraṃ vā viśanti“(mu.u.1 / 2 / 10) iti hyuktam /
GV05prasupbu:126_1: ṛṣayaḥ svargadraṣṭāraḥ prajākāmāḥ prajārthino gṛhasthāstasmātsvakṛtameva dakṣiṇaṃ
GV05prasupbu:127: eṣa ha vai rayirannaṃ yaḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ pitṛyāṇapalakṣitaḥ //9//
GV05prasupbu:130: athottareṇa tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śraddhayā vidyayātmānam anviṣyādityam abhijayante |
GV05prasupbu:131: etad vai prāṇānām āyatanam etad amṛtam ayam etat parāyaṇam |
GV05prasupbu:138: tapasendriyajayena viśeṣato brahmacarye śraddhayā vidyayā ca prajāpatyātmaviṣayā ātmānaṃ prāṇaṃ sūryaṃ jagatastasthuṣaścānviṣyāhamasmīti viditvādityamabhijayante 'bhiprāpnuvanti /
GV05prasupbu:141: etatparāyaṇaṃ parā gatiḥ vidyāvatāṃ karmiṇāṃ ca jñānavatām /
GV05prasupbu:144: ādityādi niruddhā avidvāṃso naite saṃvatsaramādityamātmānaṃ prāṇamabhiprāpnuvanti /
GV05prasupbu:149: pañcapādaṃ pitaraṃ dvādaśakṛtiṃ diva āhuḥ pare ardhe purīṣiṇam /
GV05prasupbu:150: atheme anya u pare vicakṣaṇaṃ saptacakre ṣaḍara āhurarpitamiti // PrUp_1.11 //
GV05prasupbu:153: pañcapādaṃ pañcartavaḥ pādā ivāsya saṃvatsarātmana ādityasya tairasau pādairivartubhirāvartate /
GV05prasupbu:156_0: taṃ dvādaśākṛtiṃ dvādaśamāsā ākṛtayo 'vayavā ākaraṇaṃ vākyavikaraṇam asya dvādaśamāsaistaṃ
GV05prasupbu:156_1: dvādaśākṛtiṃ divo dyulokātpara ūrdhver'the sthāne tṛtīyāsyāṃ divītyarthaḥ purīṣiṇaṃ
GV05prasupbu:157_0: atha tamevānya ima u pare kālavido ticakṣaṇaṃ nipuṇaṃ sarvajñaṃ saptacakre saptahayarūpeṇa
GV05prasupbu:157_1: cakre satataṃ gatimati kālātmani ṣaḍare ṣaḍṛtumatyāhuḥ sarvamidaṃ jagatkathayanti
GV05prasupbu:158: yadi pañcapādo dvādaśākṛtiryadivā saptacakraḥ ṣaḍaraḥ sarvathāpi saṃvatsaraḥ kālātmā prajāpatiḥ candrādityalakṣaṇo 'pi jagataḥ kāraṇam //11//
GV05prasupbu:161: yasminn idaṃ śritaṃ viśvaṃ sa eva prajāpatiḥ saṃvatsarākhyaḥ svāvayave māse kṛtsnaḥ parisamāpyate /
GV05prasupbu:163: tasya kṛṣṇapakṣa eva rayiḥ śuklaḥ prāṇaḥ |
GV05prasupbu:164: tasmād eta ṛṣayaḥ śukla iṣṭaṃ kurvantītara itarasmin || PrUp_1.12 ||
GV05prasupbu:168: tasya māsātmanaḥ prajāpatereko bhāgaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣo rayirannaṃ candramāḥ /
GV05prasupbu:170: aparo bhāgaḥ śuklapakṣaḥ prāṇa ādityo 'ttāgniḥ yasmācchuklapakṣātmānaṃ prāṇaṃ sarvameva paśyanti tasmātprāṇadarśina eta ṛṣayaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣastairna dṛśyate yasmāt /
GV05prasupbu:171: itare tu prāṇaṃ na paśyantītyadarśanalakṣaṇaṃ kṛṣṇātmānameva paśyanti /
GV05prasupbu:172: itarasmin kṛṣṇapakṣa eva kurvanti śukle kurvanto 'pi //12//
GV05prasupbu:177: prāṇaṃ vā ete praskandanti ye divā ratyā saṃyujyante |
GV05prasupbu:184: prāṇamaharātmānaṃ vā ete praskandanti nirgamayanti śoṣayanti vā svātmano vicchidyāpanayanti ke?
GV05prasupbu:185: ye divāhani ratyā ratikāraṇabhūtayā saha striyā saṃyujyante mithunaṃ maithunamācaranti mūḍhāḥ /
GV05prasupbu:186: yata evaṃ tasmāttanna kartavyamiti pratiṣedhaḥ prāsaṃṅgikaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:187: yadrātrau saṃyujyante ratyā ṛtau brahmacaryameva taditi praśastatvādṛtau bhāryāgamanaṃ kartavyamityayamapi prāsaṅgiko vidhiḥ /
GV05prasupbu:192: annaṃ vai prajāpatis tato ha vai tadretaḥ |
GV05prasupbu:193: tasmād imāḥ prajāḥ prajāyanta iti || PrUp_1.14 ||
GV05prasupbu:198: tatastasmāddha vai reto nṛbījaṃ tatprajākaraṇaṃ tasmādyoṣiti siktādimā manuṣyādilakṣaṇāḥ prajāḥ prajāyante /
GV05prasupbu:199: yatpṛṣṭaṃ kuto ha vai prajāḥ prajāyanta iti /
GV05prasupbu:203: tad ye ha vai tatprajāpativrataṃ caranti |
GV05prasupbu:210: tattatraivaṃ sati ye gṛhasthāḥ - ha vai iti prasiddhasmaraṇārthau nipātau - tatprajāpatervrataṃ prajāpativratamṛtau bhāryāgamanaṃ caranti kurvanti teṣāṃ dṛṣṭaphalamidam /
GV05prasupbu:212: adṛṣṭaṃ ca phalamiṣṭāpūrtadattakāriṇāṃ teṣāmeva eṣa yaścāndramaso brahmalokaḥ pitṛyāṇalakṣaṇo yeṣāṃ tapaḥ snātakavratādīni,
GV05prasupbu:214: yeṣu ca satyamanṛtavarjanaṃ pratiṣṭhitamavyabhicāritayā vartate nityameva //15//
GV05prasupbu:215: yastu punarādityopalakṣita uttarāyaṇaḥ prāṇātmabhāvo virajaḥ śuddho na candrabrahmalokavadrajasvalo vṛddhikṣayādiyukto 'sau teṣāṃ keṣāmityucyate -
GV05prasupbu:218: teṣām asau virajo brahmaloko na yeṣu jihvam anṛtaṃ na māyā ceti || PrUp_1.16 ||
GV05prasupbu:221: yathā gṛhasthānāmekaviruddhasaṃvyavahāraprayojanavattvājjihraṃ kauṭilyaṃ vakrabhāvo 'vaśyaṃbhāvi tathā na yeṣu jihram /
GV05prasupbu:222: yathā ca gṛhasthānāṃ krīḍānarmādinimittamanṛtamavarjanīyaṃ tathā na yeṣu tat /
GV05prasupbu:223: tathā māyā gṛhasthānāmiva na yeṣu vidyate /
GV05prasupbu:224: māyā nāma bahiranyathātmānaṃ prakāśyanyathaiva kāryaṃ karoti sā māyā mithyācārarūpā /
GV05prasupbu:225: māyetyevamādayo doṣā yeṣvadhikāriṣu brahmacārivānaprasthabhikṣuṣu nimittābhāvānna vidyante tatsādhanānurūpeṇaiva teṣāmasau virajo brahmaloka ityeṣā jñānayuktakarmavatāṃ gatiḥ /
GV05prasupbu:231: tasya prajāpatitvamattṛtvaṃ ca asmiñśarīre 'vadhārayitavyamiti ayaṃ praśna ārabhyate -
GV05prasupbu:237: kaḥ punar eṣāṃ variṣṭha iti || PrUp_2.1 ||
GV05prasupbu:240: athānantaraṃ ha kilainaṃ bhārgavo vaidarbhiḥ papraccha /
GV05prasupbu:241: he bhagavan katyeva devāḥ prajāṃ śarīralakṣaṇāṃ vidhārayante viśeṣeṇa dhārayante /
GV05prasupbu:247: ākāśo ha vā eṣa devo vāyur agnir āpaḥ pṛthivī vāṅmanaścakṣu śrotraṃ ca |
GV05prasupbu:249: vayam etad bāṇam avaṣṭabhya vidhārayāmaḥ || PrUp_2.2 ||
GV05prasupbu:252_0: evaṃ pṛṣṭavate tasmai sa hovāca ākāśo ha vā eṣa devo vāyuḥ agniḥ āpaḥ pṛthivītyetāni
GV05prasupbu:252_1: pañca mahābhūtāni śarīrārambhakāṇi vāṅmanaścakṣuḥśrotramityādīni karmendriyabuddhīndriyabuddhīndriyāṇi ca /
GV05prasupbu:253: kāryalakṣaṇāḥ karaṇalakṣaṇāśca te devā ātmano māhātmyaṃ prakāśyābhivadanti spardhamānā ahaṃ śreṣṭhatāyai /
GV05prasupbu:255: vayametadbāṇaṃ kāryakaraṇasaṃghātamavaṣṭabhya pāsādam iva stambhādayo 'viśithilīkṛtya vidhārayāmo vispaṣṭaṃ dhārayāmaḥ //2//
GV05prasupbu:259: mā mohamāpadyatha, aham evaitat pañcadhātmānaṃ pravibhajyaitad bāṇamavaṣṭabhya vidhārayāmīti |
GV05prasupbu:264_0: mā maivaṃ mohamāpadyatha avivekitayā abhimānaṃ mā kuruta yasmādahameva etadbāṇamavaṣṭabhya
GV05prasupbu:264_1: vidhārayāmi pañcadhātmānaṃ pravibhajya prāṇādivṛttibhedaṃ svasya kṛtvā vidhārayāmītyuktavati
GV05prasupbu:269: tasmiṃś ca pratiṣṭhamāne sarva eva prātiṣṭhante |
GV05prasupbu:270: tad yathā makṣikā madhukararājānam utkrāmantaṃ sarvā evotkrāmante |
GV05prasupbu:271: tasmiṃś ca pratiṣṭhamāne sarvā eva prātiṣṭhante |
GV05prasupbu:276: sa ca prāṇasteṣāmaśraddhadhānatāmālakṣyābhimānādūrdhvamutkrāmata ivedamutkrāntavāniva saroṣānnirapekṣastasminnutkrāmati yadvṛttaṃ tadddṛṣṭāntena pratyakṣīkaroti /
GV05prasupbu:277: tasminnutkrāmati satyathānantaram evetare sarva eva prāṇāścakṣurādāya utkrāmanta uccakramire /
GV05prasupbu:278: tasmiṃśca prāṇe pratiṣṭhamāne tūṣṇīṃ bhavati anutkrāmati sati sarva eva prātiṣṭhante tūṣṇīṃ vyavasthitā abhūvan /
GV05prasupbu:279: tattatra yathā loke makṣikā madhukarāḥ svarājānaṃ madhukararājānam utkrāmantaṃ prati sarvā evotkrāmante tasmiṃśca pratiṣṭhamāne sarvā eva pratiṣṭhante prātitiṣṭhanti /
GV05prasupbu:280: yathāyaṃ dṛṣṭānta evaṃ vāṅmanaścakṣuḥśrotraṃ cetyādayasta utsṛjyāśraddadhānatāṃ buddhvā prāṇamāhātmyaṃ prītāḥ prāṇaṃ stuvanti //4//
GV05prasupbu:284: eṣo 'gnis tapaty eṣa sūrya eṣa parjanyo maghavān eṣa vāyuḥ /
GV05prasupbu:285: eṣa pṛthivī rayir devaḥ sadasac cāmṛtaṃ ca yat // PrUp_2.5 //
GV05prasupbu:289: tathaiva sūryaḥ san prakāśate, tathaiva parjanyaḥ san varṣati /
GV05prasupbu:290: kiṃ ca maghavānindraḥ sanā prajāḥ pālayati, jighāṃsatyasurarakṣāṃsi /
GV05prasupbu:292: kiṃ caiṣa pṛthivī rayirdevaḥ sarvasya jagataḥ sanmūrtamasadamūrtaṃ cāmṛtaṃ ca yaddevānāṃ sthitikāraṇaṃ kiṃ bahunā //5//
GV05prasupbu:295: arā iva rathanābhau prāṇe sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GV05prasupbu:296: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni yajñaḥ kṣatraṃ brahma ca // PrUp_2.6//
GV05prasupbu:299: arā iva rathanābhau śraddhādi nāmāntaṃ sarvaṃ sthitikāle prāṇa eva pratiṣṭhitam /
GV05prasupbu:300: tatharco yajūṃṣi sāmānīti trividhā mantrāḥ tatsādhyaśca yajñaḥ kṣatraṃ ca sarvasya pālayitṛ brahma ca yajñādikarmakartṛtve 'dhikṛtaṃ caivaiṣa prāṇaḥ sarvam //6//
GV05prasupbu:304: prajāpatiś carasi garbhe tvam eva pratijāyase |
GV05prasupbu:305: tubhyaṃ prāṇa prajās tv imā baliṃ haranti yaḥ prāṇaiḥ pratiṣṭhasi || PrUp_2.7 ||
GV05prasupbu:308: yaḥ prajāpatirapi sa tvameva garbhe carasi,
GV05prasupbu:309: piturmātuśca pratirūpaḥ sanpratijāyase;prajāpatitvādeva prāgeya siddhaṃ tava mātṛpitṛtvam /
GV05prasupbu:311: tubhyaṃ tvadarthaṃ yā isā manuṣyādyāḥ prajāstu he prāṇa cakṣurādidvārairbali haranti /
GV05prasupbu:312: yastvaṃ prāṇaiścakṣurādibhiḥ saha pratitiṣṭhasi sarvaśarīreṣvatastubhyaṃ baliṃ harantīti yuktam;
GV05prasupbu:317: devānām asi vahnitamaḥ pitṝṇāṃ prathamā svadhā /
GV05prasupbu:318: ṛṣīṇāṃ caritaṃ satyam atharvāṅgirasām asi // PrUp_2.8 //
GV05prasupbu:321: devānāmindrādīnāmasi bhavasi tvaṃ vahnitamo haviṣāṃ prāpayitṛtamaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:322: pitṛṇāṃ nāndīmukhe śrāddhe yā pitṛbhyo dīyate svadhānnaṃ sā devapradhānamapekṣya prathamā bhavati /
GV05prasupbu:323: tasyā api pitṛbhyaḥ prāpayitā tvamevetyarthaḥ kiṃ carṣīṇāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ prāṇānāmaṅgirasāmaṅgirasabhūtānāmatharvaṇāṃ teṣāmeva“prāṇo vātharvā“iti śruteḥ,
GV05prasupbu:327: indras tvaṃ prāṇa tejasā rudro 'si saṃharañ jagat |
GV05prasupbu:328: sthitau ca pari samantādrakṣitā pālayitā parirakṣitā |
GV05prasupbu:330: tvam antarikṣe 'jasraṃ carasi udayāstamayābhyāṃ sūryas tvam eva ca sarveṣāṃ jyotiṣāṃ patiḥ || PrUp_2.9 ||
GV05prasupbu:333: indraḥ parameśvarastvaṃ he prāṇa tejasā vīryeṇa rudro 'si saṃharajjagat /
GV05prasupbu:334: sthitau ca pari samantādrakṣitā pālayitā parirakṣitā tvameva jagataḥ saumyena rūpeṇa /
GV05prasupbu:335: tvamantarikṣe 'jasraṃ carasi udayāstamayābhyāṃ sūryastvameva ca sarveṣāṃ jyotiṣāṃ patiḥ //9//
GV05prasupbu:338: yadā tvam abhivarṣasy athemāḥ prāṇa te prajāḥ /
GV05prasupbu:342: yadā parjanyo bhūtvābhivarṣasi tvamatha tadānnaṃ prāpyemāḥ prajāḥ prāṇate prāṇaceṣṭāṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:343_1: cānandarūpāḥ sukhaṃ prāptā iva satyaḥ tiṣṭhanti kāmāyecchāto 'nna bhaviṣyatītyevamabhiprāyaḥ //10 //
GV05prasupbu:348: vayam ādyasya dātāraḥ pitā tvaṃ mātariśva naḥ // PrUp_2.11//
GV05prasupbu:351: prathamajatvādanyasya saṃskartuḥ abhāvādasaṃskṛto vrātyastvaṃ svabhāvata eva śuddha ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:352: he prāṇaikarṣistvamātharvaṇānāṃ prasiddha ekarṣināmāgriḥ sannattā sarvahaviṣām /
GV05prasupbu:353: tvameva viśvasya sarvasya sato vidyamānasya patiḥ satpatiḥ /
GV05prasupbu:362: yā te tanūrvāci pratiṣṭhitā yā śrotraṃ yā ca cakṣuṣi /
GV05prasupbu:363: yā ca manasi saṃtatā śivāṃ tāṃ kuru motkramīḥ // PrUp_2.12 //
GV05prasupbu:366: yā te tvadīyā sanūrvāci pratiṣṭhitā vaktṛtvena vadanaceṣṭāṃ kurvatī,
GV05prasupbu:367: yā śrotre yā ca cakṣuṣi yā ca manasi saṅkalpādivyāpāreṇa santatā samanugatā tanūstāṃ śivāṃ śāntāṃ kuru motkramīrutkramaṇena aśivāṃ mā kārṣīrityarthaḥ //12//
GV05prasupbu:371: prāṇasyedaṃ vaśe sarvaṃ tridive yat pratiṣṭhitam /
GV05prasupbu:372: māteva putrān rakṣasva śrīś ca prajñāṃ ca vidhehi na iti // PrUp_2.13 //
GV05prasupbu:375: asmiṃlloke prāṇasyaiva vaśe sarvamidaṃ yatkiñcidupabhogajātaṃ tridive tṛtīyasyāṃ divi ca yatpratiṣṭhitaṃ devādyupabhogajātaṃ tasyāpi prāṇa eveśitā rakṣitā /
GV05prasupbu:377: tvannimittā hi brāhmyaḥ kṣātriyāśca śriyastāstvaṃ śrīśca śriyaśca prajñāṃ ca tvatsthitinimittāṃ vidhehi no vidhasva ityarthaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:378: ityevaṃ sarvātmatayā vāgādibhiḥ prāṇaiḥ stutyā gamitamahimā prāṇaḥ prajāpatirattetyavadhṛtam //13//
GV05prasupbu:394: prāṇo hyevaṃ prāṇairnirdhāritatattvairupalabdhamahimāpi saṃhatatvātsyādasyaḥ kāryatvamataḥ pṛcchāmi bhagavankṛtaḥ kasmātkāraṇādeṣa āyātyasmiñśarīre /
GV05prasupbu:396: praviṣṭaśca śarīra ātmānaṃ vā pravibhajya pravibhāgaṃ kṛtvā kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa prātiṣṭhate pratitiṣṭhati kena vā vṛttiviśeṣeṇāsmāccharīrādutkrāmata utkrāmati /
GV05prasupbu:397: kathaṃ bāhyamadhibhūtamadhidaivataṃ cābhidhatte dhārayati kathamadhyātmam iti,
GV05prasupbu:410: brahmiṣṭho 'sītyatiśayena tvaṃ brahmavidatastuṣṭo 'haṃ tasmātte tubhyaṃ bravīmi yatpṛṣṭaṃ śruṇu //2//
GV05prasupbu:420_0: yathā loka eṣā puruṣe śiraḥ pāṇyādilakṣaṇe nimitte chāyā naimittikī jāyate tadvadetasminbrahmaṇyetat
GV05prasupbu:420_1: prāṇākhyaṃ chāyāsthānīyamanṛtarūpaṃ tattvaṃ satye puruṣa ātataṃ samarpitam ityetat /
GV05prasupbu:421: chāyeva dehe manokṛtena manaḥ saṅkalpecchādiniṣpannakarmanimittenetyetat - vakṣyati hi“puṇyena puṇyam“(pra.u.3 / 7)
GV05prasupbu:428: evam evaiṣa prāṇa itarān prāṇān pṛthak pṛthag eva saṃnidhatte || PrUp_3.4 ||
GV05prasupbu:431: yathā yena prakāreṇa loke rājā samrāḍeva grāmādiṣvadhikṛtānviniyuṅkte /
GV05prasupbu:433: evameva yathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ eṣa mukhyaḥ prāṇaḥ itarānprāṇān cakṣurādīnātmabhedāṃśca pṛthak pṛthageva yathāsthānaṃ saṃnidhatte viniyuṅkte //4//
GV05prasupbu:440: eṣa hy etad dhutam annaṃ samaṃ nayati |
GV05prasupbu:446: tathā cakṣuḥśrotre cakṣuśca śrotraṃ ca cakṣuḥśrotraṃ tasmiṃścakṣuḥśrotre,
GV05prasupbu:447_0: mukhanāsikābhyāṃ ca mukhaṃ ca nāsikā ca tābhyāṃ mukhanāsikābhyāṃ ca nirgacchanprāṇaḥ
GV05prasupbu:447_1: svayaṃ samrāṭsthānīyaḥ pratiṣṭhate pratitiṣṭhati madhye tu prāṇāpānayoḥ sthānayornābhyāṃ
GV05prasupbu:447_2: samāne 'śitaṃ pītaṃ ca samaṃ nayatīti samānaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:448_0: eṣa hi yasmādyadetaddhṛtaṃ bhuktaṃ pītaṃ cātmāgre prakṣiptamannaṃ samaṃ nayati tasmādaśitapītendhanād
GV05prasupbu:448_1: agreraudaryāddhṛdayadeśaṃ prāptādetāḥ saptasaṃkhyākā arciṣo dīptayo nirgacchantyo
GV05prasupbu:459: iti hyeṣa puṇḍarīkākāramāṃsapiṇḍaparicchinne hṛdayākāśa eṣa ātmātmanā saṃyukto liṅgātmā /
GV05prasupbu:460: atrāsminhṛdaya etadekaśatam ekottaraśataṃ saṃkhyayā pradhānanāḍīnāṃ bhavatīti /
GV05prasupbu:462: punarapi dvāsaptatirdvāsaptatirdve dve sahasre adhike saptatiśca sahasrāṇi sahasrāṇāṃ dvāsaptatiḥ pratiśākhānāḍīsahasrāṇi /
GV05prasupbu:464: āsu nāḍīṣu vyāno vāyuḥ carati vyāno vyāpanāt /
GV05prasupbu:465: ādityādiva raśmayo hṛdayāt sarvagāminībhirnāḍībhiḥ sarvadehaṃ saṃvyāpya vyāno vartate /
GV05prasupbu:466: sandhiskandhamarmadeśeṣu viśeṣeṇa prāṇāpānavṛttyośca madhya udbhūtavṛttirvīryavatkarmakartā bhavati //6//
GV05prasupbu:469: athaikayordhva udānaḥ puṇyena puṇyaṃ lokaṃ nayati |
GV05prasupbu:474_0: atha yā tu tatraikaśatānāṃ nāḍīnāṃ madhya ūrdhvagā suṣumnākhyā nāḍī tathaikayordhvaḥ
GV05prasupbu:474_1: sannudāno vāyurāpādatalamastakavṛttiḥ sañcaranpuṇyena karmaṇā śāstravihitena puṇyaṃ
GV05prasupbu:474_2: lokaṃ devādisthānalakṣaṇaṃ nayati prāpayati pāpena tadviparītena pāpaṃ narakaṃ tiryagyonyādilakṣaṇam /
GV05prasupbu:478: ādityo ha vai bāhyaḥ prāṇa udayati |
GV05prasupbu:479: eṣa hy enaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ prāṇam anugṛhṇānaḥ |
GV05prasupbu:480: pṛthivyāṃ yā devatā saiṣā puruṣasyāpānam avaṣṭabhya |
GV05prasupbu:485: ādityo ha vai prasiddho hyadhidaivataṃ bāhyaḥ prāṇaḥ sa eṣa udayatyudgacchati /
GV05prasupbu:486: eṣa hyainam ādhyātmikaṃ cakṣuṣi bhavaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ prāṇaṃ prakāśenānugṛhṇāno rūpopalabdhau cakṣuṣa ālokaṃ kurvannityarthaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:487: tathā pṛthivyāmabhimāninī yā devatā prasiddhā saiṣā putrasya apānamapānavṛttimavaṣṭabhyākṛṣya vaśīkṛtyādha evāpakarṣaṇenānugrahaṃ kurvatī vartata ityarthaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:489: yadetadantarā madhye dyāvāpṛthivyorya ākāśastatstho vāyuḥ ākāśa ucyate;mañcaśthavat /
GV05prasupbu:492: sāmānyena ca yo bāhyo vāyuḥ sa vyāptisāmānyād vyāno vyānamanugṛhṇāno vartata ityabhiprāyaḥ //8//
GV05prasupbu:500: yadvāhyaṃ ha vai prasiddhaṃ sāmānyaṃ tejastaccharīra udāna udānaṃ vāyumanugṛhṇāti svena prakāśenetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:501: yasmāttejaḥ - svabhāvo bāhyatejo 'nugṛhīta utkrāntikartā tasmādyadā laukikaḥ puruṣa upaśāntatejā bhavati;
GV05prasupbu:509: prāṇas tejasā yuktaḥ sahātmanā yathā saṃkalpitaṃ lokaṃ nayati || PrUp_3.10 ||
GV05prasupbu:512: yaccitto bhavati tenaiva cittena saṃkalpenendriyaiḥ saha prāṇaṃ mukhyaprāṇavṛttimāyāti /
GV05prasupbu:515_0: sa ca prāṇastejasodānavṛttyā yuktaḥ sansahātmanā svāminā bhoktā sa evamudānavṛttyaiva
GV05prasupbu:515_1: yuktaḥ prāṇastaṃ bhoktāraṃ puṇyapāpakarmavaśādyathāsaṃkalpitaṃ yathābhipretaṃ lokaṃ
GV05prasupbu:523: yaḥ kaścidevaṃ vidvānyathoktaviśeṣaṇairviśiṣṭamutpattyādibhiḥ prāṇaṃ veda jānāti tasyedaṃ phalam aihikamāmuṣmikaṃ cocyate /
GV05prasupbu:524: na hāsya naivāsya viduṣaḥ prajā putrapautrādilakṣaṇā hīyate chidyate /
GV05prasupbu:526: tadetasminnarthe saṃkṣepābhidhāyaka eṣa śloko mantro bhavati //11//
GV05prasupbu:529: utpattim āyātiṃ sthānaṃ vibhutvaṃ caiva pañcadhā |
GV05prasupbu:530: adhyātmaṃ caiva prāṇasya vijñāyāmṛtam aśnute vijñāyāmṛtam aśnuta iti || PrUp_3.12 ||
GV05prasupbu:533_0: utpattiṃ paramātmanaḥ prāṇasyāyatimāgamanaṃ manokṛtenāsmin śarīre sthānaṃ sthitiṃ
GV05prasupbu:533_1: ca pāyūpasthādisthāneṣu vibhutvaṃ ca svāmyameva samrāḍiva prāṇavṛttibhedānāṃ pañcadhā
GV05prasupbu:533_2: sthāpanaṃ bāhyamādityādirūpeṇa adhyātmaṃ caiva cakṣurādyākāreṇa avasthānaṃ vijñāyaivaṃ
GV05prasupbu:533_3: prāṇamamṛtam aśnuta iti vijñāyāmṛtamaśnuta iti dvirvacanaṃ praśnārthaparisamāptyartham //12 //
GV05prasupbu:544: kasmin nu sarve saṃpratiṣṭhitā bhavantīti || PrUp_4.1 ||
GV05prasupbu:548: praśnatrayeṇāparavidyāgocaraṃ sarvaṃ parisamāpya saṃsāraṃ vyākṛtaviṣayaṃ sādhyasādhanalakṣaṇamanityam;
GV05prasupbu:549_1: satyaṃ paravidyāgamyaṃ puruṣākhyaṃ sabāhyābhyantaramajaṃ vaktavyamityuttaraṃ praśnatrayamārabhyate /
GV05prasupbu:550: tatra sudīptādivāgreryasmāt parādakṣarātsarve bhāvā visphuliṅgā iva jāyante tatra caivāpiyanti ityuktaṃ dvitīye muṇḍake;
GV05prasupbu:555: bhagavannetasminpuruṣo śiraḥ pāṇyādimati kāni karaṇāni svapanti svāpaṃ kurvanti svavyāpārāduparamante?
GV05prasupbu:556: kāni cāsmin jāgrati jāgaraṇamanidrāvasthāṃ svavyāpāraṃ kurvanti kataraḥ kāryakaraṇa lakṣaṇayoreṣa devaḥ svapnānpaśyati?
GV05prasupbu:558: tatkiṃ kāryalakṣaṇena devena nirvartyante kiṃ vā karaṇalakṣaṇena kenacidityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:559: uparate ca jāgratsvapnavyāpāre yatprasannaṃ nirāyāsalakṣaṇamanābādhaṃ sukhaṃ kasyaitadbhavati /
GV05prasupbu:560: tasminkāle jāgratsvapnavyāpārād uparatāḥ santaḥ kasminnu sarve samyagekībhūtāḥ saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GV05prasupbu:561: madhuni rasavatsamudrapraviṣṭanadyādivacca vivekānarhāḥ pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti saṃgatāḥ saṃpratiṣṭhitā bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:562: nanu nyastadātrādikaraṇāt svavyāpārāduparatāni pṛthakpṛthageva svātmanyavatiṣṭhanta ityetadyuktam /
GV05prasupbu:563: kutaḥ prāptiḥ suṣuptapuruṣāṇāṃ karaṇānāṃ kasmiṃścidekībhāvagamanāśaṅkāyāḥ praṣṭuḥ /
GV05prasupbu:565: yataḥ saṃhatāni karaṇāni svābhyarthāni paratantrāṇi ca jāgradviṣaye tasmāt svāpe 'pi saṃhatānāṃ pāratantryeṇaiva kasmiṃścitsaṃtirnyāyyeti tasmād āśaṅkānurūpa eva praśno 'yam /
GV05prasupbu:566: atra tu kāryakaraṇasaṃghāto yasmiṃśca pralīnaḥ suṣuptapralayakālayostadviśeṣaṃ bubhutsoḥ sa ko nu syāditi kasminsarve saṃpratiṣṭhitā bhavantīti //1//
GV05prasupbu:570: yathā gārgya marīcayo'rkasyās taṃ gacchataḥ sarvā etasmiṃs tejomaṇḍala ekībhavanti |
GV05prasupbu:572: evaṃ ha vai tat sarvaṃ pare deve manasy ekībhavati |
GV05prasupbu:573: tena tarhy eṣa puruṣo na śṛṇoti |
GV05prasupbu:586: tasmai sa hovācācāryaḥ - śṛṇu he gārgya yattvayā pṛṣṭam /
GV05prasupbu:587_0: yathā marīcayo raśmayor'kasya ādityasyāstamadarśanaṃ gacchataḥ sarvā aśeṣata etasmiṃstejomaṇḍale
GV05prasupbu:587_2: tāḥ punaḥ punarudayata udgacchataḥ pracaranti vikīryante /
GV05prasupbu:589: evaṃ ha vai tatsarvaṃ viṣayendriyādijātaṃ pare prakṛṣṭe deve dyotanavati manasi cakṣurādidevānāṃ manastantratvātparo devo manaḥ tasminsvapnakāla ekībhavati /
GV05prasupbu:591: jijāgariṣośca raśmimavanmaṇḍalānmanasa eva pracaranti svavyāpārāya pratiṣṭhante /
GV05prasupbu:592_0: yasmātsvapnakāle śrotrādīni śabdādyupalabdhikaraṇāni manasi ekībhūtānīva karaṇavyāpārād
GV05prasupbu:592_1: uparatāni tena tasmāttarhi tasmin svāpakāla eṣa devadattādilakṣaṇaḥ puruṣo na śṛṇoti
GV05prasupbu:592_2: na paśyati na jighrati na rasayate na spṛśate nābhivadate nādatte nānandayate na
GV05prasupbu:602: suptatsu śrotrādiṣu karaṇeṣu etasminpure navadvāre dehe prāṇāgnayaḥ prāṇā eva pañca vāyavo 'gnaya ivāgnayo jāgrati /
GV05prasupbu:603: agnisāmānyaṃ hi āha - gārhapatyo ha vā eṣo 'pānaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:604: kathamityāha - yasmādgārhapatyādagneragnihotrakāla itaro 'gniḥ āhavanīyaḥ praṇīyate praṇayanāt praṇīyate 'smāditi praṇayano gārhapatyo 'gniḥ /
GV05prasupbu:605: tathā suptasyāpānavṛtteḥ praṇīyata iva prāṇo mukhanāsikābhyāṃ saṃcaratyata āhavanīyasthānīyaḥ prāṇaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:610: yad ucchvāsaniḥśvāsāvetāvāhutī samaṃ nayatīti sa samānaḥ |
GV05prasupbu:613: sa enaṃ yajamānam aharaharbrahma gamayati || PrUp_4.4 ||
GV05prasupbu:616: yadyasmāducchvāsaniḥśvāsau agnihotrāhutī iva nityaṃ dvitvasāmānyādeva tvetāvāhutī samaṃ sāmyena śarīrasthitibhāvāya nayati yo vāyuragnisthānīyo 'pi hotā cāhutyornetṛtvāt /
GV05prasupbu:620: sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni vicinvantyapi svapata iti hi vājasaneyake /
GV05prasupbu:621_0: atra hi jāgrasu prāṇāgniṣu upasaṃhṛtya bāhyakaraṇāni viṣayāṃśca agnihotraphalamiva
GV05prasupbu:621_1: svarga brahma jigamiṣurmano ha vāva yajamāno jāgarti yajamānavatkāryakaraṇeṣu prādhānyena
GV05prasupbu:621_2: saṃvyavahārātsvargamiva brahma prati prasthitatvādyajamāno manaḥ kalpyate /
GV05prasupbu:625: sa udāno mana ākhyaṃ yajamānaṃ svapnavṛttirūpādapi pracyāvyāharahaḥ suṣuptikāle svargamiva brahmākṣaraṃ gamayati /
GV05prasupbu:627: evaṃ viduṣaḥ śrotrādyuparamakālādārabhya yāvatsuptotthito bhavati tāvatsarvayāgaphalānubhava eva nāviduṣāmivānarthāyeti vidvattā stūyate /
GV05prasupbu:628: na hi viduṣa eva śrotrādīni svapante prāṇāgnayo vā jāgrati jāgratsvapnayormanaḥ svātantryamanubhavadaharahaḥ suṣuptaṃ vā pratipadyate /
GV05prasupbu:629: samānaṃ hi sarvaprāṇināṃ paryāyeṇa jāgratsvapnasuṣuptigamanamato vidvattāstutireva iyamupapadyate /
GV05prasupbu:630: yatpṛṣṭaṃ katara eṣa devaḥ svapnānpaśyatīti tadāha -
GV05prasupbu:636: deśadigantaraiś ca pratyanubhūtaṃ punaḥ punaḥ pratyanubhavati |
GV05prasupbu:637: dṛṣṭaṃ cādṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cāśrutaṃ cānubhūtaṃ cānanubhūtaṃ ca saccāsacca sarvaṃ paśyati |
GV05prasupbu:641_0: atroparateṣu śrotrādiṣu deharakṣāyai jāgratsu prāṇādivāyuṣu prāksuṣuptipratipatteḥ
GV05prasupbu:641_1: etasmin antarāla eṣa devor'karaśmivat svātmani saṃhṛtaśrotrādikaraṇaḥ svapne mahimānaṃ
GV05prasupbu:642: nanu mahimānubhavane karaṇaṃ mano 'nubhavitustatkathaṃ svātantryeṇānubhavati ityucyate svatantro hi kṣetrajñaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:643: naiṣa doṣaḥ kṣetrajñasya svātantrya mana upādhikṛtatvānna hi kṣetrajñaḥ paramārthataḥ svataḥ svapiti jāgarti vā /
GV05prasupbu:644: mana upādhikṛtameva tasya jāgaraṇaṃ svapnaścetyuktaṃ vājasaneyake“sa hi svapno bhūtvā dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva” (bṛ.u.4 / 3 / 7) ityādi /
GV05prasupbu:646: mana upādhisahitatve svapnakāle kṣetrajñasya svayaṃ jyotiṣṭvaṃ bādhyeteti kecit tanna,
GV05prasupbu:650: “mātrāsaṃsargastvasya bhavati” “yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet” (bṛ.u.2 / 4 / 14) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:652: nanvevaṃ sati“atrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayañjyotiḥ” (bṛ.u.3 / 3 / 14) iti viśeṣaṇamanarthakaṃ bhavati /
GV05prasupbu:655: satyamevamayaṃ doṣo yadyapi syātsvapne kevalayā svayañjyotiṣṭvenārdhaṃ tāvadapanītaṃ bhārasyeti cet /
GV05prasupbu:657: iti śruteḥ purītannāḍīsambandhādatrāpi puruṣasya svayañjyotiṣṭvenārdhabhārāpanayābhiprāyo mṛṣaiva /
GV05prasupbu:660: na athaikatvasyeṣṭatvādeko hyātmā sarvavedāntānāmartho vijijñāpayiṣito bubhutsitaśca /
GV05prasupbu:663: evaṃ tarhi śṛṇu śrutyarthaṃ hitvā sarvamabhimānaṃ na tvabhimānena varṣaśatenāpi śrutyartho jñātuṃ śakyate sarvaiḥ paṇḍitammanyaiḥ /
GV05prasupbu:664: yathā - hṛdayākāśe purītati nāḍīṣu ca svapatastatsaṃbandhābhāvāttato vivicya darśayituṃ śakyata ityātmanaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ na bādhyate /
GV05prasupbu:665_2: svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ sudarpitenāpi tārkikeṇa na vārayituṃ śakyate /
GV05prasupbu:666: tasmāt sādhūktaṃ manasi pralīneṣu karaṇeṣu apralīne ca manasi manomayaḥ svapnānpaśyatīti /
GV05prasupbu:667: kathaṃ mahimānamanubhavatītyucyate yanmitraṃ putrādapi vā pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadvāsanāvāsitaḥ putramitrādivāsanāsamudbhūtaṃ putraṃ mitramiva vā vidyayā paśyatītyevaṃ manyate /
GV05prasupbu:669: deśadigantaraiśca deśāntarairdigantaraiśca pratyanubhūtaṃ punaḥ punastatpratyanubhavatīvāvidyayā tathā dṛṣṭaṃ cāsmiñjanmanyadṛṣṭaṃ ca janmāntaradṛṣṭamityarthaḥ,
GV05prasupbu:671: evaṃ śrutaṃ cāśrutaṃ cānubhūtaṃ cāsmiñjanmani kevalena manasā ananubhūtaṃ ca manasaiva janmāntare 'nubhūtamityarthaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:673: kiṃ bahunoktaṃ sarvaṃ paśyati sarvaḥ paśyati sarvamanovāsanopādhiḥ sannevaṃ sarvakaraṇātmā manodevaḥ svapnānpaśyati //5//
GV05prasupbu:678: atha tadaitasmiñ śarīra etat sukhaṃ bhavati || PrUp_4.6 ||
GV05prasupbu:681_0: sa yadā manorūpo devo yasminkāle saureṇa pittākhyena tejasā nāḍīśayena sarvatobhi'bhūto
GV05prasupbu:681_1: bhavati tiraskṛtavāsanādvāro bhavati tathā saha karaṇaiḥ manaso raśmayo hṛdyupasaṃhṛtā bhavanti /
GV05prasupbu:682: yadā mano dārvagnivadaviśeṣavijñānarūpeṇa kṛsnaṃ śarīraṃ vyāpyavatṣṭate tadā suṣupto bhavati /
GV05prasupbu:683: atraitasminkāla eṣa mana ākhyo devaḥ svapnānna paśyati darśanadvārasya tejasā /
GV05prasupbu:684_0: atha tadaitasmiñśarīra etatsukhaṃ bhavati yadvijñānaṃ nirābādhamaviśeṣeṇa śarīravyāpakaṃ
GV05prasupbu:684_1: prasannaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ // 6 // etasminkāle 'vidyākāmakarmanibandhanāni kāryakaraṇāni śāntāni bhavanti /
GV05prasupbu:685: teṣu śānteṣu ātmasvarūpamupādhibhiranyathā vibhāvyamānamadvayamekaṃ śivaṃ śāntaṃ bhavatītyetāmevāvasthāṃ pṛthivyādyavidyākṛtamātrānupraveśena darśayituṃ dṛṣṭāntamāha -
GV05prasupbu:688: sa yathā somya vayāṃsi vāsovṛkṣaṃ saṃpratiṣṭhante |
GV05prasupbu:689: evaṃ ha vai tat sarvaṃ para ātmani saṃpratiṣṭhate || PrUp_4.7 ||
GV05prasupbu:692: sa dṛṣṭānto yathā yena prakāreṇa somya priyadarśana vayāṃsi pakṣiṇo vāsārthaṃ vṛkṣaṃ vāsovṛkṣaṃ prati saṃpratiṣṭhante gacchanti /
GV05prasupbu:693: evaṃ yathā dṛṣṭānto ha vai tadvakṣyamāṇaṃ sarvaṃ para ātmanyakṣare saṃpratiṣṭhate //7//
GV05prasupbu:720: pṛthivī ca sthūlā pañcaguṇā tatkāraṇā ca pṛthivīmātrā ca gandhatanmātrā,
GV05prasupbu:726: tathā cakṣuścendriyaṃ rūpaṃ ca draṣṭavyaṃ ca,
GV05prasupbu:744: tejaśca tvagindriyavyatirekeṇa prakāśaviśiṣṭā yā tvaktayā nirbhāsyo viṣayo vidyotayitavyam,
GV05prasupbu:745: prāṇaśca sūtraṃ yadācakṣate tena vidhārayitavyaṃ saṃgrathanīyaṃ sarvaṃ hi kāryakaraṇajātaṃ pārārthyena saṃhataṃ nāmarūpātmakametāvadeva //8//
GV05prasupbu:746: athaḥ paraṃ yadātmarūpaṃ jalasūryakādivadbhoktṛtvakartṛtvena iha anupraviṣṭam -
GV05prasupbu:749: eṣa hi draṣṭā spraṣṭā śrotā ghrātā rasayitā mantā boddhā kartā vijñānātmā puruṣaḥ |
GV05prasupbu:753_0: eṣa hi draṣṭā spraṣṭā śrotā ghrātā rasayitā mantā boddhā kartā vijñānātmā vijñānaṃ
GV05prasupbu:753_1: vijñāyate 'neneti karaṇabhūtaṃ buddhyādīdaṃ tu vijānātīti vijñānaṃ kartṛkārarūpaṃ
GV05prasupbu:755: sa ca jalasūryakādipratibimbasya sūryādipraveśavajjagadādhāraśeṣe pare 'kṣi ātmani saṃpratiṣṭhate //9//
GV05prasupbu:760: sa yo ha vai tadacchāyam aśarīram alohitaṃ śubhram akṣaraṃ vedayate yas tu somya |
GV05prasupbu:766: sa yo ha vai tatsarvaiṣaṇāvinirmukto 'cchāyaṃ tamovarjitam,
GV05prasupbu:773: śivaṃ śāntaṃ sabāhyābhyantaramajaṃ vedayate vijānāti yastu sarvatyāgī somya sa sarvajño na tena viditaṃ kiñcit sambhavati /
GV05prasupbu:774: pūrvamavidyayā sarvajña āsītpunarvidyayāvidyāpanaye sarvo bhavati tadā /
GV05prasupbu:775: tattasminnartha eṣa śloko mantro bhavati uktārthasaṃgrāhakaḥ //10//
GV05prasupbu:778: vijñānātmā saha devaiś ca sarvaiḥ prāṇā bhūtāni saṃpratiṣṭhanti yatra /
GV05prasupbu:779: tad akṣaraṃ vedayate yas tu somya sa sarvajñaḥ sarvam evāviveśeti // PrUp_4.11 //
GV05prasupbu:782_0: vijñānātmā saha devaiścāgnyādibhiḥ prāṇaścakṣurādayo bhūtāni pṛthivyādīni saṃpratiṣṭhanti
GV05prasupbu:782_1: praviśanti yatra yasminnakṣare tadakṣaraṃ vedayate yastu somya priyadarśana sa sarvajñaḥ
GV05prasupbu:789: sa yo ha vai tad bhagavan manuṣyeṣu prāyaṇāntam oṃkāram abhidhyāyīta |
GV05prasupbu:790: katamaṃ vāva sa tena lokaṃ jayatīti || PrUp_5.1 ||
GV05prasupbu:793: atha hainaṃ śaibyaḥ satyakāmaḥ papraccha - athedānīṃ parāparabrahmaprāptisādhanatvenoṅkārasyopāsanavidhitsayā praśna ārabhyate -
GV05prasupbu:794: sa yaḥ kaścid vai bhagavan manuṣyeṣu manuṣyāṇāṃ madhye tad adbhutamiva prāyaṇāntaṃ maraṇāntam,
GV05prasupbu:800: aneke hi jñānakarmabhirjetavyā lokāstiṣṭhanti teṣu tenoṅkārābhidhyānena katamaṃ sa lokaṃ jayati //1//
GV05prasupbu:804: etad vai satyakāma paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yad oṃkāraḥ |
GV05prasupbu:808: iti pṛṣṭavate tasmai sa hovāca pippalādaḥ etasmai satyakāma /
GV05prasupbu:809: etadbrahma vai paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma paraṃ satyamakṣaraṃ puruṣākhyamaparaṃ ca prāṇākhyaṃ prathamajaṃ yattadoṅkāra evoṅkārātmakamoṅkārapratīkatvāt /
GV05prasupbu:810: paraṃ hi brahma śabdādyupalakṣaṇānarhaṃ sarvadharmaviśeṣavarjitamato na śakyamatīndriyagocaratvātkevalena manasāvagāhitum /
GV05prasupbu:811: oṅkāre tu viṣṇvādipratimāsthānīye bhaktyāveśitabrahmabhāve dhyāyināṃ tatprasīdati ityetadavagamyate śāstraprāmāṇyāt tathāparaṃ ca brahma /
GV05prasupbu:812: tasmātparaṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yadoṅkāra ityupacaryate /
GV05prasupbu:813: tasmādevaṃ vidvānetenaivātmaprāptisādhanenaivoṅkārābhidhyānena ekataraṃ paramaparaṃ vānveti brahmānugacchati nediṣṭaṃ hyālambanamoṅkāro brahmaṇaḥ //2//
GV05prasupbu:817: sa tenaiva saṃveditas tūrṇam eva jagatyām abhisampadyate |
GV05prasupbu:819: sa tatra tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śraddhayā sampanno mahimānam anubhavati || PrUp_5.3 ||
GV05prasupbu:822: sa yadyapyoṅkārasya sakalamātrāvibhāgajño na bhavati tathāpi oṅkārābhidhyānaprabhāvādviśiṣṭameva gatiṃ gacchati;
GV05prasupbu:825_0: yadyapyevam oṅkāramevaikamātrāvibhāgajña eva kevalo 'bhidhyāyītaikamātraṃ sadā dhyāyīta
GV05prasupbu:825_1: sa tenaivaikamātra viśiṣṭoṅkārābhidhyānenaiva saṃveditaḥ sambodhitastūrṇaṃ kṣiprameva
GV05prasupbu:828: tatra taṃ sādhakaṃ jagatyāṃ manuṣyalokamevarca upanayanta upanigamayanti /
GV05prasupbu:829_0: tena sa tatra manuṣyajanmani dvijāgryaḥ saṃstapasā brahmacaryeṇa śraddhayā ca saṃpanno
GV05prasupbu:829_1: mahimānaṃ vibhūtimanubhavati na vītaśraddho yatheṣṭaceṣṭo bhavati yogabhraṣṭaḥ kadācidapi
GV05prasupbu:834: sa somaloke vibhūtim anubhūya punar āvartate || PrUp_5.4 ||
GV05prasupbu:837_0: atha punaryadi dvimātravibhāgajño dvimātreṇa viśiṣṭamoṅākāram abhidhyāyīta svapnātmake
GV05prasupbu:837_1: manasi mananīye yajurmaye somadaivatye saṃpadyata ekāgratayātbhāvaṃ gacchati sa evaṃ
GV05prasupbu:837_3: somalokaṃ saumyaṃ janma prāpayanti taṃ yajūṃṣītyarthaḥ sa tatra vibhṛtimanubhūya
GV05prasupbu:840: yaḥ punar etaṃ trimātreṇomity etenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣam abhidhyāyīta |
GV05prasupbu:843: evaṃ ha vai sa pāpmanā vinirmuktaḥ sa sāmabhir unnīyate brahmalokam |
GV05prasupbu:844: sa etasmāj jīvadhanāt parāparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣam īkṣate tad etau ślokau bhavataḥ || PrUp_5.5 ||
GV05prasupbu:847: yaḥ punaretamoṅkāraṃ trimātreṇa trimātrāviṣayavijñānaviśiṣṭena omityetenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ sūryāntargataṃ puruṣaṃ pratīkenābhidhyāyīta tenābhidhyānena,
GV05prasupbu:848: pratīkatvena hyālambanatvaṃ prakṛtam oṅkārasya paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahmetyabhedaśruteroṅkāramiti ca dvitīyānekaśaḥ śrutā bādhyetānyathā /
GV05prasupbu:849: yadyapi tṛtīyābhidhyānatvena karaṇatvamupapadyate tathāpi prakṛtānurodhāt trimātraṃ paraṃ puruṣamiti dvitīyaiva pariṇeyā“tyajedekaṃ kulasyārthe“(mahā.u.37 / 17) iti nyāyena /
GV05prasupbu:850: sa tṛtīyamātrārūpastejasi sūrye saṃpanne bhavati dhyāyamāno mṛto 'pi sūryātsomalokādivanna punarāvartate kintu sūrye saṃpannamātra eva /
GV05prasupbu:851: yathā pādodaraḥ sarpastvacā vinirmucyate jīrṇatvagvinirmuktaḥ sa punarnavo bhavati /
GV05prasupbu:852_0: evaṃ ha vā eṣa yathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa pāpmanā sarpatvaksthānīyenāśuddhirūpeṇa vinirmuktaḥ
GV05prasupbu:852_1: sāmabhistṛtīyamātrārūpairūrdhvamunnīyate brahmalokaṃ hiraṇyagarbhasya brahmaṇo lokaṃ satyākhyam /
GV05prasupbu:854: sa hyantarātmā liṅgarūpeṇa sarvabhūtānām, tasminhi liṅgātmani saṃhatāḥ sarve jīvāḥ /
GV05prasupbu:856: sa vidvāṃstrimātroṅkārābhijña etasmājjīvaghanāddhiraṇyagarbhātparātparaṃ paramātmākhyaṃ puruṣamīkṣate puriśayaṃ sarvaśarīrānupraviṣṭaṃ paśyati dhyāyamānaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:860: tisro mātrā mṛtyumatyaḥ prayuktā anyonyasaktā anaviprayuktāḥ /
GV05prasupbu:861: kriyāsu bāhyābhyantaramadhyamāsu samyakprayuktāsu na kampate jñaḥ // PrUp_5.6 //
GV05prasupbu:864: tisrastrisaṃkhyakā akārokāramakārākhyā oṅkārasya mātrā mṛtyumatyo mṛtyuryāsāṃ vidyate tā mṛtyumatyo mṛtyugocarādanatikrāntāmṛtyugocarā evetyarthaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:870_1: yogakriyāsu samyakprayuktāsu samyagdhyānakāle prayojitāsu na kampate na calati yo
GV05prasupbu:873: sa hyevaṃ vidvānsarvātmabhūta oṅkāramayaḥ kuto vā caletkasminvā //6//
GV05prasupbu:877: ṛgbhir etaṃ yajurbhir antarikṣaṃ sāmabhir yat tat kavayo vedayante /
GV05prasupbu:878: tam oṃkāreṇaivāyatanenānveti vidvān yat tac chāntam ajaram amṛtam abhayaṃ paraṃ ceti // PrUp_5.7 //
GV05prasupbu:883: sāmabhiryattad brahmalokamiti tṛtīyaṃ kavayo medhāvino vidyāvanta eva nāvidvāṃso vedayante /
GV05prasupbu:885_0: tenaivoṅkāreṇa yattatparaṃ brahmākṣaraṃ satyaṃ puruṣākhyaṃ śāntaṃ vimuktaṃ jāgratsvapnasuṣupātyādi
GV05prasupbu:885_1: viśeṣasarvaprapañcavivarjitamata eva ajaraṃ jarāvarjitamamṛtaṃ mṛtyuvarjitamata eva
GV05prasupbu:895: bhagavan hiraṇyanābhaḥ kausalyo rājaputro māmupetyaitaṃ praśnamapṛcchata |
GV05prasupbu:897: tam ahaṃ kumāram abruvaṃ nāham imaṃ veda |
GV05prasupbu:898: yady aham imam avediṣaṃ kathaṃ te nāvakṣyam iti |
GV05prasupbu:899: samūlo vā eṣa pariśuṣyati yo 'nṛtam abhivadati |
GV05prasupbu:902: taṃ tvā pṛcchāmi kāsau puruṣa iti || PrUp_6.1 ||
GV05prasupbu:906: samastaṃ jagatkāryakāraṇalakṣaṇaṃ saha vijñānātmanā parasminnakṣare suṣuptikāle sampratiṣṭhata ityuktam /
GV05prasupbu:907: sāmarthyātpralaye 'pi tasminnevākṣare sampratiṣṭhate jagattata evotpadyata iti siddhaṃ bhavati /
GV05prasupbu:909: uktaṃ ca ātmana eṣa prāṇo jāyate'iti /
GV05prasupbu:910: jagataśca yanmūlaṃ tatparijñānātparaṃ śreya iti sarvopaniṣadāṃ niścitor'thaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:911: anantaraṃ coktaṃ 'sa sarvajñaḥ sarvo bhavati'iti vaktavyaṃ ca kva tarhi tadakṣaraṃ satyaṃ puruṣākhyaṃ vijñeyamiti tadarthoyaṃ praśna ārabhyate /
GV05prasupbu:912: vṛttānvākhyānaṃ ca vijñānasya durlabhatvakhyāpanena tallabdhyarthaṃ mumukṣaṇāṃ yatnaviśeṣopādānārtham /
GV05prasupbu:913: he bhagavan hiraṇyanābho nāmataḥ kosalāyāṃ bhavaḥ kausalyo rājaputro jātitaḥ kṣatriyo mām upetyopagamyaitamucyamānaṃ praśnamapṛcchata /
GV05prasupbu:914: ṣoḍaśakalaṃ ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyākāḥ kalā avayavā iva ātmanyavidyādhyāropitarūpā yasmin puruṣe so 'yaṃ ṣoḍaśakalastaṃ ṣoḍaśakalaṃ he bhāradvāja puruṣaṃ vettha vijānāsi /
GV05prasupbu:915: tamahaṃ rājaputraṃ kumāraṃ pṛṣṭavantamabruvamuktavānasmi nāhamimaṃ veda yaṃ tvaṃ pṛcchasīti /
GV05prasupbu:917: yadi kathañcidahamimaṃ tvayā pṛṣṭaṃ puruṣamavediṣaṃ viditavānasmi kathamatyantaśiṣyaguṇavate 'rthine te tubhyaṃ nāvakṣyaṃ noktavānasmi na brūyāmityarthaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:919: samūlaḥ saha mūlena vā eṣo 'nyathā santamātmānamanyathā kurvannanṛtamayathābhūtārthamabhivadati yaḥ sa pariśuṣyati śoṣamupaitīhalokaparalokābhyāṃ vicchidyate vinaśyati /
GV05prasupbu:920: yata evaṃ jāne tasmānnārhābhyahamanṛtaṃ vaktuṃ mūḍhavat /
GV05prasupbu:921: sa rājaputra evaṃ pratyāyita tūṣṇīṃ vrīḍito rathamāruhya pravavrāja pragatavān yathāgatameva /
GV05prasupbu:922: ato nyāyata upasannāya yogyāya jānatā vidyā vaktavyaivānṛtaṃ ca na vaktavyaṃ sarvāsvapyavasthāsu ityetatsiddhaṃ bhavati /
GV05prasupbu:923: taṃ puruṣaṃ tvā tvāṃ pṛcchāmi mama hṛdi vijñeyatvena śalyamiva sthitaṃ kvāsau vartate vijñeyaḥ puruṣa iti //1//
GV05prasupbu:927: ihaivāntaḥ śarīre somya sa puruṣo yasminn etāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ prabhavantīti || PrUp_6.2 ||
GV05prasupbu:931_0: ihaivāntaḥśarīre hṛdayapuṇḍarīkākāśamadhye he somya sa puruṣo na deśāntare vijñeyo
GV05prasupbu:931_1: yasminnetā ucyamānāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ prāṇādyāḥ prabhavanti utpadyanta iti ṣoḍaśakalābhiḥ
GV05prasupbu:931_2: upādhibhūtābhiḥ sakala iva niṣkalaḥ puruṣo lakṣyate 'vidyayeti tadupādhikalādhyāropāpanayena
GV05prasupbu:931_3: vidyayā sa puruṣaḥ kevalo darśayitavya iti kalānāṃ tatprabhavatvamucyate /
GV05prasupbu:932: prāṇādīnāmatyantanirviśeṣe hyadvaye śuddhe tattve na śakyo 'dhyāropamantareṇa pratipādyapratipādanādivyavahāraḥ kartumiti kalānāṃ prabhavasthityapyayā āropyante avidyāviṣayāḥ /
GV05prasupbu:933: caitanyāvyatirekeṇaiva hi kalā jāyamānāḥ tiṣṭhantyaḥ pralīyamānāśca sarvadā lakṣyante /
GV05prasupbu:934: ata eva bhrāntāḥ kecid agnisaṃyogād ghṛtamiva ghaṭādyākāreṇa caitanyam eva pratikṣaṇaṃ jāyate naśyatīti /
GV05prasupbu:938: anapāyopajanadharmakacaitanyamātmā eva nāmarūpādyupādhidharmaiḥ pratyavabhāsate “satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma“(tai.u.2 / 1 / 1)
GV05prasupbu:943: svarūpavyabhicāriṣu padārtheṣu caitanyasyāvyabhicārādyathā yathā yo yaḥ padārtho vijñāyate tathā tathā jñāyamānatvādeva tasya tasya caitanyasyāvyabhicāritvam /
GV05prasupbu:944: vastutattvaṃ bhavati kiñcit na jñāyata iti cānupapannam rūpaṃ ca dṛśyate na cāsti cakṣuriti yathā /
GV05prasupbu:945: vyabhicarati tu jñeyam na jñānaṃ vyabhicarati kadācidapi jñeyam,
GV05prasupbu:947: na hi jñāne 'sati jñeyaṃ nāma bhavati kasyacit suṣupte 'darśanāt /
GV05prasupbu:950: na hyandhakāre cakṣuṣā rūpānupalabdhau cakṣuṣo 'bhāvaḥ śakyaḥ kalpayituṃ vaināśikena /
GV05prasupbu:952: yena tadabhāvaṃ kalpayettasyābhāvaḥ kena kalpyata iti vaktavyaṃ vaināśikena,
GV05prasupbu:955_1: tadavyatiriktaṃ cejjñānaṃ nityaṃ kalpitaṃ syāttadabhāvasya ca jñānātmakatvādabhāvatvaṃ
GV05prasupbu:957: athābhāvo jñeyo 'pi san jñānavyatirikta iti cet /
GV05prasupbu:959: jñeyaṃ jñānavyatiriktaṃ na tu jñānaṃ jñeyavyatiriktamiti cet /
GV05prasupbu:961_0: jñeyajñānayorekatvaṃ cedabhyupagamyate jñeyaṃ jñānavyatiriktaṃ jñānaṃ jñeyavyatiriktaṃ
GV05prasupbu:961_1: neti tu śabdamātrametadvahniragnivyatiriktaḥ agnirna vahnivyatirikta iti yadvadabhyupagamyate /
GV05prasupbu:962: jñeyavyatireke tu jñānasya jñeyābhāve jñānābhāvānupapattiḥ siddhā /
GV05prasupbu:969: na hi tatsiddhaṃ mṛtamivojjīvayituṃ punaranyathā kartuṃ śakyate vaināśikaśatairapi /
GV05prasupbu:970: jñānasya jñeyatvameveti tadapyanyena tadapyanyeneti tvatpakṣe 'tiprasaṅga iti cet /
GV05prasupbu:972: yadā hi sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ kasyacittadā tadvyatiriktaṃ jñānaṃ jñānameveti dvitīyo vibhāga evābhyupagamyate 'vaināśikerna tṛtīyastadviṣaya ityanavasthānupapattiḥ /
GV05prasupbu:980: sarvadeśakālapuruṣādyavasthamekameva jñānaṃ nāmarūpādyanekopādhibhedāt savitrādijalādipratibimbavad anekadhāvabhāsata iti nāsau doṣaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:984: na hi śarīramātraparicchinnasya prāṇaśraddhādīnāṃ kalānāṃ kāraṇatvaṃ pratipattuṃ śaknuyāt /
GV05prasupbu:986: na hi puruṣakāryāṇāṃ kalānāṃ kāryaṃ saccharīraṃ kāraṇakāraṇaṃ svasya puruṣaṃ kuṇḍabadaramivābhyantarīkuryāt /
GV05prasupbu:988: yathā bījakāryaṃ vṛkṣastatkāryaṃ ca phalaṃ svakāraṇakāraṇaṃ bījamabhyantarīkarotyāmrādi tadvat puruṣamabhyantarīkuryāccharīraṃ svakāraṇakāraṇamapīti cet /
GV05prasupbu:990: dṛṣṭānte kāraṇabījāt vṛkṣaphalasaṃvṛtānyanyānyeva bījāni dārṣṭāntike tu svakāraṇakāraṇabhūtaḥ sa eva puruṣaḥ śarīre 'bhyantarīkṛtaḥ śrūyate /
GV05prasupbu:991: bījavṛkṣādīnāṃ sāvayavatvācca syādādhārādheyatvaṃ niravayavaśca puruṣaḥ sāvayavāśca kalāḥ śarīraṃ ca /
GV05prasupbu:992: etenākāśasyāpi śarīrādhāratvamanupapannaṃ kimutākāśakāraṇasya purusya tasmādasamāno dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:999: darśanaśravaṇamananavijñānādiliṅgaiḥ antaḥ śarīre paricchinna iva hyupalabhyate puruṣa upalabhyate cāta ucyate 'ntaḥ śarīre somya sa puruṣa iti /
GV05prasupbu:1000: na punarākāśakāraṇaḥ sankuṇḍabadaravaccharīraparicchinna iti manasāpīcchati vaktuṃ mūḍho 'pi kimuta pramāṇabhūtā śrutiḥ //2//
GV05prasupbu:1001_0: yasminnetāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ prabhavantītyuktaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ kalānāṃ prabhavaḥ
GV05prasupbu:1001_1: sa cānyārthe 'pi śrutaḥ kena krameṇa syādityata idamucyate - cetanapūrvikā ca sṛṣṭirityevamarthaṃ ca /
GV05prasupbu:1005: kasminn aham utkrānta utkrānto bhaviṣyāmi kasmin vā pratiṣṭhite pratiṣṭhāsyāmīti || PrUp_6.3 ||
GV05prasupbu:1008: sa puruṣaḥ ṣoḍaśakalaḥ pṛṣṭo yo bhāradvājena īkṣāntakra īkṣyaṃ darśanaṃ cakre kṛtavānityarthaḥ sṛṣṭiphalakramādiviṣayam /
GV05prasupbu:1010: ahamevaṃ kasminvā śarīre pratiṣṭhite ahaṃ pratiṣṭhāsyāmi pratiṣṭhitasyāmityarthaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:1014: prāṇāc chadvāṃ khaṃ vāyur jyotir āpaḥ pṛthivīndriyaṃ mano 'nnam annād vīryaṃ tapo mantrāḥ karma lokā lokeṣu nāma ca || PrUp_6.4 ||
GV05prasupbu:1020: sattvādiguṇasāmye pradhāne pramāṇopapanne sṛṣṭikartari satīścarecchānuvartiṣu vā paramāṇuṣu satsvātmano 'pyekatvena kartṛtve sādhanābhāvādātmana ātmanyanarthakartṛtvānupapatteśca /
GV05prasupbu:1022: tasmātpuruṣārthena prayojanena īkṣāpūrvakamiva niyatakrameṇa pravartamāne 'cetane pradhāne cetanavadupacāre 'yaṃ sa īkṣāñcakre ityādiḥ /
GV05prasupbu:1023: yathā rājñaḥ sarvārthakāriṇi bhṛtye rājeti tadvat /
GV05prasupbu:1025: yathā sāṃkhyasya cinmātrasyāpāraṇāmino 'pyātmano bhoktṛtvaṃ tadvadvedavādināmīkṣādipūrvakaṃ jagatkartṛtvamupapannaṃ śrutiprāmāṇyāt /
GV05prasupbu:1027_0: ataḥ puruṣasya svātmanyeva bhoktṛtvaṃ cinmātrasvarūpavikriyā na doṣāya bhavatāṃ punarvedavādināṃ
GV05prasupbu:1029_3: śivam iṣyate na tatra kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ vā kriyākārakaphalaṃ ca syād advaitatvātsarvabhāvānām.
GV05prasupbu:1030_0: sāṃkhyāstvavidyādhyāropitam eva puruṣe kartṛtvaṃ kriyākārakaṃ phalaṃ ceti kalpayitvāgamabāhyatvātpunastatastrasyantaḥ
GV05prasupbu:1030_1: paramārthata eva bhoktṛtvaṃ puruṣasyecchanti tattvāntaraṃ ca pradhānaṃ puruṣātparamārthavastubhūtameva
GV05prasupbu:1032: ityevaṃ parasparaviruddhārthakalpanāt āmiṣārthina iva prāṇino 'nyonyaviruddhamānārthadarśitvāt paramārthatattvāddūram evāpakṛṣyante /
GV05prasupbu:1033: atastanmatamanādṛtya vedāntārthatattvamekatvadarśanaṃ prati ādaravanto mumukṣavaḥ syuriti tārkikamatadoṣapradarśanaṃ kiñciducyata asmābhirna tu tārkikavattātparyeṇa /
GV05prasupbu:1039: kā nāmāsau kartṛtvājjātyantarabhūtā bhoktṛtvaviśiṣṭā vikriyā yato bhoktaiva puruṣaḥ kalpyate na kartā pradhānaṃ tu kartreva na bhoktriti /
GV05prasupbu:1040_0: nanūktaṃ puruṣaścinmātra eva sa ca svātmastho vikriyate bhuñjāno na tattvāntarapariṇāmena
GV05prasupbu:1040_1: pradhānaṃ tu tattvāntarapariṇāmena pradhānaṃ tu tattvāntarapariṇāmena vikriyate 'to
GV05prasupbu:1042_0: prāgbhogotpatteḥ kevalacinmātrasya puruṣasya bhoktṛtvaṃ nāma viśeṣo bhogotpattikāle
GV05prasupbu:1042_1: cejjāyate nivṛtte ca bhoge punastadviśeṣādapetaścinmātra eva bhavatīti cenmahadādyākāreṇa
GV05prasupbu:1042_2: ca pariṇamya pradhānaṃ tato 'petya punaḥ pradhānaṃ tato 'petya punaḥ pradhānaṃ svarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhata
GV05prasupbu:1042_3: ityasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ na kaścidviśeṣa iti vāṅmātreṇa pradhānapuruṣayorviśiṣṭavikriyā kalpyate /
GV05prasupbu:1043: atha bhogakāle 'pi cinmātra eva prāgvatpuruṣa iti cet /
GV05prasupbu:1045: bhogakāle cinmātrasya vikriyā paramārthaiva tena bhogaḥ puruṣasyeti cet /
GV05prasupbu:1051: bhogadharmavati sattvāṅgini cetasi puruṣasya caitanyapratibimbodayo 'vikriyasya puruṣasya bhoktṛtvamiti cet /
GV05prasupbu:1053: bhogarūpaścedanarthaḥ puruṣasya nāsti sadā nirviśeṣatvātpuruṣasya kasya apanayārthaṃ mokṣasādhanaṃ śāstraṃ praṇīyate /
GV05prasupbu:1054_1: na kartā pradhānaṃ kartreva na bhoktṛparamārthasadvastvantaraṃ puruṣāccetīyaṃ kalpanāgamabāhyāvyarthā
GV05prasupbu:1057: satsu hi śāstrapraṇetrādiṣu tatphalārthiṣu ca śāstrasya praṇayanamanarthakaṃ sārthakaṃ veti vikalpanā syāt /
GV05prasupbu:1058: na hyātmaikatve śāstrapraṇetrādayastato bhinnāḥ santi tadabhāva evaṃ vikalphanaivānupapannā /
GV05prasupbu:1060: tadabhyupagame ca vikalpānupapattimāha śāstram“yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet“(bṛ.u.2 / 4 / 14) ityādi /
GV05prasupbu:1062: “yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati“(bṛ.u.2 / 4 / 14) ityādi vistarato vājasaneyake /
GV05prasupbu:1063: atra ca vibhakte vidyāvidye parāpare ityādāveva śāstrasya /
GV05prasupbu:1064: ato na tārkikavādabhaṭapraveśo vedāntarājapramāṇabāhugupta ihātmaikatvaviṣaya iti /
GV05prasupbu:1065: etenāvidyākṛtanāmarūpādyupādhikṛtānekaśaktisādhanaśrutabhedavattvādbrāhmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭyādikartṛtve sādhanādyabhāvo doṣaḥ pratyukto veditavyaḥ parairukta ātmānarthakartṛtvādidoṣaśca /
GV05prasupbu:1066: yastu dṛṣṭānto rājñaḥ sarvārthakāriṇi kartaryupacārādrājā karteti so 'trānubhapapannaḥ“sa īkṣāñcakre“iti śrutermukhyārthabādhanātpramāṇabhūtāyāḥ /
GV05prasupbu:1067: tatra hi gauṇī kalpanā śabdasya yatra mukhyārtho na sambhavati /
GV05prasupbu:1068: iha tvacetanasya muktabaddhapuruṣaviśeṣāpekṣayā kartṛkarmadeśakālanimittāpekṣayā ca bandhamokṣādiphalārthā niyatā puruṣaṃ prati pravṛttirnopapadyate /
GV05prasupbu:1069: yathoktasarvajñeśvarakartṛtvapakṣe tūpapannā īśvareṇeva sarvādhikāri prāṇaḥ puruṣeṇa sṛjyate /
GV05prasupbu:1070: katham sa puruṣa uktaprakāreṇekṣitvā sarvaprāṇaṃ hiraṇyagarbhākhyaṃ sarvaprāṇikaraṇādhāram ātmānam asṛjata sṛṣṭavān /
GV05prasupbu:1073: svaṃ śabdaguṇam, vāyuṃ svena sparśena kāraṇaguṇena ca viśiṣṭaṃ triguṇaṃ śabdasparśābhyām /
GV05prasupbu:1074: tathāpo rasena guṇena sādhāraṇena pūrvaguṇānupraveśena ca caturguṇāḥ /
GV05prasupbu:1076: tathā gandhaguṇena pūrvaguṇānupraveśena ca pañcaguṇā pṛthivī /
GV05prasupbu:1077: tathā taireva bhūtairārabdhamindriyaṃ dviprakāraṃ buddhyarthaṃ karmārthaṃ ca daśasaṃkhyākaṃ tasya ceśvaramantaḥsthaṃ saṃśayasaṅkalpalakṣaṇaṃ manaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:1078: evaṃ prāṇināṃ kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ta sṛṣṭvā tatsthityarthaṃ vrīhiyavādilakṣaṇamannam /
GV05prasupbu:1080: tadvīryavatāṃ ca prāṇināṃ tapo viśuddhisādhanaṃ saṅkīryamāṇānām /
GV05prasupbu:1084: teṣu ca sṛṣṭānāṃ prāṇināṃ nāma ca devadatto yajñadatta ityādi /
GV05prasupbu:1085_0: evam etāḥ kalāḥ prāṇināmavidyādidoṣabījāpekṣayā sṛṣṭāḥ taimirikadṛṣṭisṛṣṭā iva dvicandramaśakamakṣikādyāḥ
GV05prasupbu:1085_1: svapnadṛksṛṣṭā iva ca sarvapadārthaḥ punastasminneva puruṣe pralīyante hitvā nāmarūpādi vibhāgam //4 //
GV05prasupbu:1089: sa yathemā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ samudrāyaṇāḥ samudraṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti |
GV05prasupbu:1092: evam evāsya paridraṣṭur imāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti |
GV05prasupbu:1095: sa eṣo 'kalo 'mṛto bhavati tadeṣa ślokaḥ || PrUp_6.5 ||
GV05prasupbu:1098_0: sa dṛṣṭānto yathā loka imā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ sravantyaḥ samudrāyaṇāḥ samudro 'yanaṃ
GV05prasupbu:1098_1: gatiḥ ātmabhovo yāsāṃ tāḥ samudrāyaṇāḥ samudraṃ prāpyopagamyāstaṃ nāmarūpatiraskāraṃ gacchanti /
GV05prasupbu:1099: tāsāṃ cāstaṃ gatānāṃ bhidyete vinaśyato nāmarūpe gaṅgāyamunetyādilakṣaṇe /
GV05prasupbu:1102_0: uktalakṣaṇasya prakṛtasyāsya puruṣasya paridraṣṭuḥ parisamantād draṣṭurdarśanasya
GV05prasupbu:1102_1: kartuḥ svarūpabhūtasya yathārkaḥ svātmaprakāśasya kartā sarvataḥ tadvadimāḥ ṣoḍaśa
GV05prasupbu:1102_2: kalāḥ prāṇādyā uktāḥ kalāḥ puruṣāyaṇā nadīnāmiva samudraḥ puruṣo 'yanamātmabhāvagamanaṃ
GV05prasupbu:1102_3: yāsāṃ kalānāṃ tāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpya puruṣātmabhāvamupagamya tathaivāstaṃ gacchanti /
GV05prasupbu:1103: bhidyete cāsāṃ nāmarūpe kalānāṃ prāṇādyākhyā rūpaṃ ca yathāsvam /
GV05prasupbu:1104: bhede ca nāmarūpayoryadanaṣṭaṃ tattvaṃ puruṣa ityevaṃ procyate brahmavidbhiḥ /
GV05prasupbu:1105_0: ya evaṃ vidvānguruṇā pradarśitakalāpralayamārgaḥ sa eṣa vidyayā pravilāpitāsvavidyākāmakarmajanitāsu
GV05prasupbu:1105_1: prāṇādikalāsvakalaḥ avidyākṛtakalānimitto hi mṛtyuḥ tadapagame 'kalatvādevāmṛto bhavati
GV05prasupbu:1108: arā iva rathanābhau kalā yasmin pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GV05prasupbu:1109: taṃ vedyaṃ puruṣaṃ veda yathā mā vo mṛtyuḥ parivyathā iti // PrUp_6.6 //
GV05prasupbu:1112: arā rathacakraparivārā iva rathanābhau rathacakrasya nābhau yathā praveśitāstadāśrayā bhavanti yathā tathetyarthaḥ,
GV05prasupbu:1113: kalāḥ prāṇādyā yasminpuruṣe pratiṣṭhitā utpattisthitilayakāleṣu taṃ puruṣaṃ kalānāmātmabhūtaṃ vedyaṃ vedanīyaṃ pūrṇatvāt puruṣaṃ puri śayanādvā veda jānīyāt,
GV05prasupbu:1114: yathā he śiṣyā mā vo yuṣmānmṛtyuḥ parivyathā mā parivyathayatu /
GV05prasupbu:1115: na cedvijñāyeta puruṣo mṛtyunimittāṃ vyathāmāpannā duḥkhina eva yūyaṃ stha /
GV05prasupbu:1120: etāvad evāham etat paraṃ brahma veda |
GV05prasupbu:1124: tānevamanuśiṣya śiṣyāṃstān hovāca pippalādaḥ kilaitāvadeva vedyaṃ paraṃ brahma veda vijānāmyahametat /
GV05prasupbu:1128: te tam arcayantas tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā yo 'smākam avidyāyāḥ paraṃ pāraṃ tārayasīti namaḥ |
GV05prasupbu:1132: tataste śiṣyā guruṇānuśiṣṭāstaṃ guruṃ kṛtārthāḥ santo vidyāniṣkrayamapaśyantaḥ kiṃ kṛtavanta ityucyate - arcayantaḥ pūjayantaḥ pādayoḥ puṣpāñjaliprakiraṇena praṇipātena ca śirasā /
GV05prasupbu:1133_0: kimūcirityāha - tvaṃ hi no 'smākaṃ pitā brahmaśarīrasya vidyayā janayitṛtvānnityasyājarāmarasyābhayasya
GV05prasupbu:1133_2: paramapunarāvṛttilakṣaṇaṃ mokṣākhyaṃ mahodadheriva pāraṃ tārayasyasmānityataḥ pitṛtvaṃ
GV05prasupbu:1135: tathāpi sa prapūjyatamo loke kimu vaktavyamātyantikābhayadāturityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05prasupbu:1136: namaḥ parama ṛṣibhyo brahmavidyāsampradāyakartṛbhyo namaḥ paramaṛṣibhya iti dvirvacanamādarārtham //8//
